receiveText: Enter your mobile number in order to receive a verification code.
sendNumberText: Please enter the six digit code sent on your mobile number
tapHere: Tap here change number or try again.
name: Name
checkStep2: Check Your COVID Test Status - Step2
completeGuideLines: Please complete the following screener question, which are based on guidelines from public health officials.
testsCovid: Have you been tested for COVID?
pastContact: In the past 14 days, have you had contact(of more than 15 minutes, at less than 6 feet distance) with someone who has a confirmed case of Coronavirus(COVID-19)?
past14: Within the past 14 days, have you travelled to any of the following areas?
older: Are you 60 years old or older?
describeWork: Do any of the following describe your work settings?(Select all that apply)
healthCare: Healthcare Facility : I work on a clinic, hospital, nursing home, or senior care facility or other healthcare facility.
prision: Prison : I work in a jail, prison, or other setting of incarcerated persons.
firstResponder: First responder : I am a first responder, such as an ambulance/firefighter/police or other law enforcement..
currentlySymptoms: Do you currently have any of the following symptoms? Select all that apply :
immuneSystemSuppression: I am currently experiencing immune system suppression
donottouch: Please refrain from touching any surfaces, while the help is on the way.
bloodPressure: In general, do you currently have any health conditions that you manage(such as diabetes, asthma, or high blood pressure)?
chronicalCondition: Please select any chronic conditions that you are currently managing
expired2: The sms code has expired. Please re-send the verification code to try again.
pushNotification: Allow COVID Tracker to send you push notification?
notify: COVID19 Tracker keeps you notified about all the new updates on your profile.
chemotherepy: I currently undergo chemotherapy or radiation for cancer
immuneSystem: I currently experience immune system suppression(for example, being treated with chemotherapy,  HIV positive, have had an organ transplant, or are taking medications that suppress the immune system)
allowAccess: Allow COVID19 Tracker to access your location
validNumber: Please enter a valid phone number.
validEmail: Please enter a valid email address
alreadyExist: user with this phone or email already exists
resendVerificationCode: Please check the OTP or please re-send the verification code and try again.
otpText: Please enter a 6 digit OTP code or please re-send the verification code and try again.
locationText: Maha Rakshak uses location to help you provide the right service.
havingSymptoms: Are you having any of the following symptoms?
closeDiagnosis: In past 14 days, have you had contact (of more than 15 Mins at less than 6 feet distance) with someone whose laboratory diagnosis of COVID -19 is confirmed?
internationally: With in past 14 days. Have you travelled Internationally or Domestically?
nearestHospital: Contact your nearest hospital for information
allSuggestion: All suggestions shared are up to date based on offered initiatives and helplines. Should you at any time like to consult a professional do connect with our helpline or doctor.
termsLocation: Location - This app will not always track your location but only once for data and overall reporting purposes. Your privacy and security is very important to us.
termsSecurity: Security - The app will keep your data private with enterprise grade security, and allow you updates and support through helplines, WhatsApp bots, and all state issued infrastructure that is available for your use.
termsNotification: Notifications - To stay updated and fight this crisis please do allow notifications so you are updated with all available practices for support, psychological help, helplines, ambulance support, and more.
corona: Call our helpline number to get medical assistance.
wearMask: This app will provide you corona related information.
socialDistance: You are a Corona Warrior, Practice Social Distancing.
stayHome: World will be a better place again, we need your support in the difficult times.
callAmbulancePositive: Based of the information provided you are likely to have Covid 19 which needs immediate attention -  Please seek help as needed from app.
likelycovidNegative: Please do contact helpline for more information, and questions. - You are very low likelihood of Potential Covid 19.
locationRequired: Location Permission is required. Please grant.
shareMsg: Be a true Maha Rakshak by sharing this app
